en: Who hears the verses of Allah recited to him,

ar: ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُسْتَكْبِرًا كَأَن لَّمْ يَسْمَعْهَا
en: then persists arrogantly as if he had not heard them.
So give him tidings of a painful punishment.
And when he knows anything of Our verses,
Those will have a humiliating punishment.

ar: وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُم مَّا كَسَبُوا شَيْـًٔا
en: and what they had earned will not avail them at all

ar: وَلَا مَا اتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَوْلِيَاءَ
en: nor what they had taken besides Allah as allies.
And they will have a great punishment.
